name: Shootout (speediplayz)
description:
A randomly generated platformer with collectables, upgrades and enemies to shoot at, made entirely with JavaScript/HTML/CSS.

Kill enemies, collect coins and upgrades to increase your score. Double jump for more action. Enemies have 10 health, and if they touch you, you lose.


--- Controls ---

A/D - Left/Right

W - Jump

Left-Click - shoot


--- Guns ---

Pistol - 5dmg/bullet

Shotgun - 4dmg/bullet

SMG - 2dmg/bullet

Sniper - 10dmg/bullet

Flamethrower 0.5dmg/bullet


--- Disclaimer ---

I haven't tested this game on Firefox or Internet Explorer, if there are issues with said platforms, please let me know.
